import React from 'react'; import AnimatedBlob from './AnimatedBlob'; const Hero = () => { const stats = [ { value: '150+', label: 'Local Businesses Ranked' }, { value: '#1', label: 'BANES SEO Agency' }, { value: '5★', label: 'Google Rating' }, ]; return (
{/* Animated Blobs */} {/* Additional smaller blobs for depth */}
{/* Content Container */}
{/* Left Content */}
{/* Badge */}
Helping BANES businesses get found online
{/* Main Heading */}

Get More Customers From Google

{/* Subheading */}

We help tradespeople and local businesses in Bath & North East Somerset rank higher on Google and attract more customers — guaranteed results.

{/* CTA Buttons */}
{/* Stats */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Right Content - Hero Image */}
{/* Main Image */}
{/* Floating Card - Rankings */}
Google Ranking
#1 Position
{/* Floating Card - Leads */}
Monthly Leads
+340%
{/* Industries Served */}
Trusted by: {['Plumbers', 'Electricians', 'Builders', 'Roofers', 'Landscapers', 'Salons', 'Restaurants'].map((trade, index) => ( {trade} ))}
{/* Scroll Indicator */}
{/* Gradient Overlay at Bottom */}
); }; export default Hero;
